## Supporting Types


<h4 id="getcomponentruntimesruntime">Get<wbr>Component<wbr>Runtimes<wbr>Runtime</h4>



<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="defaultport_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#defaultport_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Default<wbr>Port</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the default container port to use for filtering.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="description_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#description_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Description</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The runtime description.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="name_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#name_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the runtime name to use for filtering.
For the runtime names corresponding to each type of component, please refer to the <a href="https://support.huaweicloud.com/intl/en-us/usermanual-servicestage/servicestage_user_0411.html">document</a>.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="go">
